author: Sophia Cai, Andrew Solender
title: How Congress is reacting to Biden’s new Russia sanctions
description: One of the Senate's biggest skeptics of sanctions, Bernie Sanders, has come around to the idea.
content:
Written statements supplanted hallway interviews on Tuesday, as members of Congress reacted to Russias invasion of Ukraine while scattered across the country and around the world.
